name: Three Kingdoms VR - Jade Knight (光之三國VR - 青龍騎)
description: You ARE the legendary knight Guan Yu of the Han dynasty. With the Dragon Crescent Blade in your hand, you will dash, slash, clash your way across the battlefield on your royal mount The Red Hare, and face-off with one of your greatest adversary in an epic final boss battle!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core i5-4xxx Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: nVidia GeForce GTX 970 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 5 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i7-4xxx Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: nVidia GeForce GTX 980 Ti DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 5 GB available space
